Person.Organization: DANA-FARBER CANCER INSTHARVARD SCHOOL OF PUBLIC HEALTH

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Genomic data provided by the Lung Genomics Research Consortium (LGRC; http://lung-gemomics.org; 1RC2HL101715) using tissue samples and clinical data collected through the Lung Tissue Research Consortium (LTRC; http://www.ltrcpublic.com/).
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There is only one consent group for this study: DS-LD-IRB-PUB-MDS Use of the data must be related to Lung Diseases. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note that only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Lung Diseases, IRB, PUB, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-LD-IRB-PUB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Lung Diseases. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
There is only one consent group for this study: DS-LD-IRB-PUB-MDS Use of the data must be related to Lung Diseases. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note that only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
